ModMetaData.name: TD_EnhancementPack-1.3_Fork
ModMetaData.author: AllenCaine
ModMetaData.description:
Unofficial 1.3 Update I only changed some code lines, so the mod is compatible with the new 1.3 RimWorld code. This mod is only available until the original mod from Uuugggg is updated. More Infos: https://github.com/AllenCaine/RimWorld-EnhancementPack Any Issues: https://github.com/AllenCaine/RimWorld-EnhancementPack/issues?q=
Orginal [1.2]:
Various things that just should be in the game. https://github.com/alextd/RimWorld-EnhancementPack http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1339135272
